title: Substitution in Function
text: How can we substitute $$2$$ into the equation? We can replace $$x$$ with $$2$$ in the given function expression.

title: Taking the Square Root.
text: What is $$\sqrt{9}$$, what can be multiplied by itself to get 9? $$3\times3=9$$. Therefore, $$\sqrt{9}=3=f(2)$$.
